The 'Colony Sim' tag on SteamDB lists games that fall under the genre of colony simulation. These games allow players to build and manage their own colonies, often in challenging environments. Players must provide for their colonists' essential needs such as food, shelter, and safety while expanding their colony to thrive. Colony sim games can offer complex management systems, intricate base building mechanics, and dynamic challenges that test strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities. Players may encounter various obstacles such as harsh weather conditions, resource scarcity, or conflict with native populations. The 'Colony Sim' tag encompasses a wide range of games, from survival simulations to more focused base-building experiences, providing hours of immersive gameplay for players who enjoy managing and growing communities.
